label: 按察使
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Originally a title used of an official sent to the provinces to review the work of local officials; by this time, it had become a nominal additional post for a Middle or Major Counselor (p. 74).
